EmailTemplate.description: Notification that user has been given Case Management within the Customer community.
EmailTemplate.name: Communities: Customer Case Mgt
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Customer Community access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your Customer Community profile has been updated to include case management so the next time you log in you will see a tab for Cases.
Key features for your updated profile
Access knowledge articles Suggest ideas for product enhancements Engage with product experts and customers Ask questions, and help answer other customer questions Keep up to date on trending topics, articles and more Raise and manage support cases
Now that you have access to case management please ensure you have familiarised yourself with the Customer Support Guide (on-premise or SaaS) and have reviewed the Customer Community - Cases knowledge article.
Kind Regards
TechnologyOne Community Team
